titleStmt.title: An answer to the champion of the wooden-sword, or, A dialogue betwixt Jack and Will containing that part of his argument wherein he asserts, viz, that the dissenters are members of the Church of England : with some occasional remarks on head-corporation-magistrates as dissenters / by a member of the Church of England.
Answer to a rash dialogue betwixt Jack and Will
titleStmt.author: Member of the Church of England.
